snippet: Bryant, who has said this will be his final season, is in the Lakers’ career top five in rebounds, assists, steals, blocks, free throws, 3-pointers, personal fouls and turnovers.
abstract: Keeping Score column examines career statistics of Los Angeles Lakers' Kobe Bryant, in light of his announcement that current season will be his last; notes that Bryant always was able to do more than comparable players, for good or ill.
lead_paragraph: Bryant, who has said this will be his final season, is in the Lakers’ career top five in rebounds, assists, steals, blocks, free throws, 3-pointers, personal fouls and turnovers.

headline.print_headline: In Most Areas, Good or Bad, Bryant Has Simply Done More
headline.main: In Most Areas, Good or Bad, Kobe Bryant Has Simply Done More
